Source.Name: babashka
Source.Summary: Babashka is a native Clojure interpreter for scripting with fast startup.
Source.Description: Babashka is a native Clojure interpreter for scripting with fast startup. Its main goal is to leverage Clojure in places where you would be using bash otherwise.

Package.Name: babashka
Package.Summary: Babashka is a native Clojure interpreter for scripting with fast startup.
Package.Description: Babashka is a native Clojure interpreter for scripting with fast startup. Its main goal is to leverage Clojure in places where you would be using bash otherwise.
